actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that States and units of local government should enact legislation to prohibit the issuance of business, professional, or occupational licenses to unauthorized aliens.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that states and units of local government should enact legislation to prohibit the issuance of business, professional, or occupational licenses to aliens who are unlawfully present or not authorized to work in the United States.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that States and units of local government should enact legislation to prohibit the issuance of business, professional, or occupational licenses to unauthorized aliens.
